issue.title: Problem building the docker solution images based on a local file system

content.raw:
You cannot perform any operations outside of the docker build index used when you build you docker image.

If you want to do a `COPY` operation from a directory above \(i.e. `../`\) you need to run your Docker build from the `../` directory or modify your `build.bash` script if you’re utilizing that. I was forced to do this with a single directory up in the `subt_hello_world` repository.
